Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Monster

  • public class Monster
extends Entity
    Class Monster creates a monster object with a Point position, integer health, and booleans for having a key. A monster object also has integer attackStrength for fighting the player in the maze and a random number generator to give random attack hit points to the player wraith is a Monster object in the game MazeGame and MazeGameGUI.

    Since:
    July 20, 2019

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Monster()
      Default constructor sets the position to Point (0,3), health to 20, attackStrength to 5 and hasKey boolean to false
      Monster(Monster m)
      Copy constructor copies the location health and attackStrength from another Monster object into the new object being constructed.
      Monster(Point p, int heal, int strength)
      Input constructor sets the location by x,y coordinate pair input and initial health to heal, and attackStrength to strength.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deathMessage()
      Displays Monster death message.
      void displayStats()
      Accessor displays Monster Statistics in a decorative manner.

      • Methods inherited from class Entity

        attacks, die, getAttackStrength, getHasKey, getHealth, getPosition, isAlive, moveDown, moveLeft, moveRight, moveUp, setAttackStrength, setHasKey, setHealth, setPosition, setPosition, takesDamage

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Monster

        public Monster()
        Default constructor sets the position to Point (0,3), health to 20, attackStrength to 5 and hasKey boolean to false

      • Monster

        public Monster(Point p,
               int heal,
               int strength)
        Input constructor sets the location by x,y coordinate pair input and initial health to heal, and attackStrength to strength.
        Parameters:
        p - A Point where the monster is located on initialization.
        heal - an integer to set the initial health level of the monster.
        strength - an integer to set the attack strength of the monster.

      • Monster

        public Monster(Monster m)
        Copy constructor copies the location health and attackStrength from another Monster object into the new object being constructed.
        Parameters:
        m - A Monster object to be copy constructed.
